text: Richard Wagner (1813–1883) was a German composer. Wagner may also refer to: ==Places== ===North America=== *Wagner (community), Wisconsin, an unincorporated community *Wagner, Alberta, a hamlet in Canada *Wagner, Montana, an unincorporated village *Wagner, South Dakota, a city *Wagner, Wisconsin, a town *Wagner Lake, a lake in Minnesota *Wagner Township, Aitkin County, Minnesota *Wagner Township, Clayton County, Iowa ===Outer space=== *Wagner (crater), in the Bach quadrangle on the planet Mercury *3992 Wagner, a main-belt asteroid ==People== *Wagner (surname) *Wagner (given name) *Wagner (singer), full name Wagner Fiuza-Carrilho, Brazilian singer and participant in The X Factor *Wágner, given name and surname ==Arts and entertainment== ===Fictional characters=== *Wagner, fictional character in Marlowe's play Doctor Faustus, Goethe's Faust and Gounod's opera Faust *Wagner, a shaman in the video game Fire Emblem: Fūin no Tsurugi *Wagner, a dragon in the video game Odin Sphere *Wagner, a pig in the Finnish comic strip Viivi & Wagner *Kurt Wagner a.k.a. Nightcrawler (comics), a character in the Marvel universe ===Television=== *Wagner (mini-series), 1983 television series about Richard Wagner ==Brands and enterprises== *Nestlé Wagner GmbH, a brand of frozen pizza *Wagner Manufacturing Company, brand of cast-iron cookware *Wagner Motorcycle Company, from Minnesota ==Schools== *Wagner College, a private liberal arts college on Staten Island, New York City *Wagner Graduate School of Public Service, New York University *Karen Wagner High School, a high school in San Antonio, Texas *W.P. Wagner High School, Edmonton, Alberta, Canada ==Other uses== *USS Wagner (DE-539), USA warship *Wagner Group, Russian paramilitary organisation ==See also== *Wagner Act, common name for the National Labor Relations Act, a 1935 U.S. labor law *Wagner Seahawks, the athletic program of Wagner College *Wagner's disease, familial eye disease of the connective tissue in the eye that causes blindness *Wagner's law, an economic theory of development *Richard Wagner (disambiguation)
title: Wagner (disambiguation)
